associateuser.name: AssociateUser
associateuser.description: Grants permission to associate a subscribed user to an instance launched with license manager user subscriptions products

createlicenseserverendpoint.name: CreateLicenseServerEndpoint
createlicenseserverendpoint.description: Grants permission to create a license server endpoint for a given server type for a given Identity Provider

deletelicenseserverendpoint.name: DeleteLicenseServerEndpoint
deletelicenseserverendpoint.description: Grants permission to delete a license server endpoint for a given server type for a given Identity Provider

deregisteridentityprovider.name: DeregisterIdentityProvider
deregisteridentityprovider.description: Grants permission to deregister Microsoft Active Directory with license-manager-user-subscriptions for a product

disassociateuser.name: DisassociateUser
disassociateuser.description: Grants permission to disassociate a subscribed user from an instance launched with license manager user subscriptions products

listidentityproviders.name: ListIdentityProviders
listidentityproviders.description: Grants permission to list all the identity providers on license manager user subscriptions

listinstances.name: ListInstances
listinstances.description: Grants permission to list all the instances launched with license manager user subscription products

listlicenseserverendpoints.name: ListLicenseServerEndpoints
listlicenseserverendpoints.description: Grants permission to list license server endpoints

listproductsubscriptions.name: ListProductSubscriptions
listproductsubscriptions.description: Grants permission to lists all the product subscriptions for a product and identity provider

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a selected resource

listuserassociations.name: ListUserAssociations
listuserassociations.description: Grants permission to list all the users associated to an instance launched for a product

registeridentityprovider.name: RegisterIdentityProvider
registeridentityprovider.description: Grants permission to registers Microsoft Active Directory with license-manager-user-subscriptions for a product

startproductsubscription.name: StartProductSubscription
startproductsubscription.description: Grants permission to start product subscription for a user on a registered active directory for a product

stopproductsubscription.name: StopProductSubscription
stopproductsubscription.description: Grants permission to stop product subscription for a user on a registered active directory for a product

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a selected resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a selected resource

updateidentityprovidersettings.name: UpdateIdentityProviderSettings
updateidentityprovidersettings.description: Grants permission to update the identity provider configuration
